alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Prairie; Richland; Wibaux (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 6:22PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Wibaux, eastern Prairie, southeastern Dawson and southeastern Richland Counties through 715 PM MDT... At 622 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Glendive, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Glendive, Wibaux, Savage, Intake, West Glendive, Carlyle, Hodges, Forest Park, Stipek, Saint Phillip, Burns and Yates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT for northeastern Montana.
